Create a new order from the content of the authenticated user's cart. If operation is successful, an instance of `CheckoutOrderResponse` is returned with the new order; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, the cart is reset at the server. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

delete.description: Remove item from cart. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

get.description: Search external catalogue harvested items. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Harvest catalogue for metadata. The user can optionally select the type of the catalogue. If type is not set, the default `EnumCatalogueType.CSW` value is used. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Create drafts from items harvested from an external catalogue. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get a single catalogue item by its unique identifier and version.
get.summary: Get asset by id and version

get.description: Get a single catalogue item by its unique identifier.
Find related collection of assets (bundles) that contain the specified asset identifier.
Find related assets given an asset identifier.
Get application configuration with optional localized resources
Browse consumer's owned assets. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Downloads a resource of an asset purchased by the authenticated user or a resource of an Open Dataset.

post.description: Copies a resource file of a purchased asset to the user's Topio drive. If the file size is greater than `10MB`, the copy operation is asynchronous and a temporary file is created. The temporary file has the suffix `.copying`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

get.description: Get all user registered cards. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardCollectionResponse` is returned with the user's cards; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

post.description:
Initializes a card registration. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardRegistrationRequestResponse` is returned with the card registration data; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages.
Client must post card details to `cardRegistrationUrl` as explained in [MANGOPAY Documentation](https://docs.mangopay.com/endpoints/v2.01/cards#e1042_post-card-info) page. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

put.description: Completes the registration of a new card. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardRegistrationResponse` is returned with the new card information; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

get.description: Search consumer Order records. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Downloads the invoice for the specified order. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

Get Order details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `OrderResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

put.description: Accept the provider's custom contract with the consumer's information. The order status must be `PENDING_CONSUMER_CONTRACT_ACCEPTANCE`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Confirm that an order that is shipped externally from the platform has been delivered. The order status must be `PENDING_CONSUMER_RECEIVE_CONFIRMATION`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

get.description: Search consumer PayIn records. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

post.description: Create a new bankwire PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerBankWirePayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01) should refreshRequired role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

Create a new card direct PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerCardDirectPayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages.
Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01). If 3-D Secure validation is required or the operation fails, the cart is not updated.
Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

requestBody.description:
Card direct PayIn command.
  • If both the `billing` and `shipping` properties are empty, the information from the consumer registration is sent to the issuer.
  • If the `billing` is supplied but the `shipping` is empty, the `shipping` property is initialized with the fields supplied for `billing`.
  • If the `shipping` is supplied but the `billing` is empty, the `billing` property is initialized with fields supplied for `shipping`.

post.description: Create a new free PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerFreePayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01) should refreshRequired role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

Create a new card direct PayIn for a collection of subscription billing records. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerCardDirectPayInResponse` is returned; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

requestBody.description:
Card direct PayIn command.
  • If both the `billing` and `shipping` properties are empty, the information from the consumer registration is sent to the issuer.
  • If the `billing` is supplied but the `shipping` is empty, the `shipping` property is initialized with the fields supplied for `billing`.
  • If the `shipping` is supplied but the `billing` is empty, the `billing` property is initialized with fields supplied for `shipping`.

get.description: Get PayIn details. If the operation is successful, an instance of either `ConsumerBankWirePayInResponse` or `ConsumerCardDirectPayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

delete.description: Cancel any pending consumer registration request. Required role: `ROLE_USER`

post.description: Create or update consumer draft data in the profile of the authenticated user. When saving draft data, validation errors are ignored. Required role: `ROLE_USER`

put.description: Update consumer data in the profile of the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`

get.description: Search consumer subscription billing records. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

post.description: Create a new PayIn for a list of subscription billing record keys. If the operation is successful, an instance of `CheckoutPayInResponse` is returned with the new PayIn; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

requestBody.description:
Card direct PayIn command.
  • If both the `billing` and `shipping` properties are empty, the information from the consumer registration is sent to the issuer.
  • If the `billing` is supplied but the `shipping` is empty, the `shipping` property is initialized with the fields supplied for `billing`.
  • If the `shipping` is supplied but the `billing` is empty, the `billing` property is initialized with fields supplied for `shipping`.

get.description: Get subscription billing details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerSubscriptionBillingResponse` is returned with subscription billing details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Browse consumer's registered subscriptions. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

delete.description: Cancel an active subscription registered to the user's account. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

get.description: Get a single subscription registered to the user's account. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Downloads the contract for the specified order item. Currently only one contract exists since orders can have only a single item. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

put.description: Mark provider default contract template as accepted. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Query provider's contract template drafts. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Creates a new contract template draft. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Deletes a draft contract template. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get provider's contract template draft by key. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Updates an existing contract template. A draft template must already exists. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Publish a contract template draft. A draft template must already exists. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Create a new draft from an existing contract template. The selectedtemplate must exist and have a status in [`ACTIVE`, `INACTIVE`]. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Query master contract templates. This method is invoked by the provider client for initializing provider template creation. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Get a master contract template details by its unique key. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Downloads the contract for the specified order item. Currently only one contract exists since orders can have only a single item. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Query provider's contract templates. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Prints a contract template using sample data. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Deactivates a contract template. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get provider's contract template by key. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Search catalogue for provider's draft items based on one or more criteria. Supports data paging and sorting. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: Draft service type. Applicable only for asset type `SERVICE`
parameters.name: serviceType

post.description: Create draft item. By default the new record is locked. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: `true` if the new record must be also locked
parameters.name: lock

post.description: Create a new API draft from an existing published asset or a file in user's file system. By default, a lock is acquired for the new record. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: `true` if the new record must also be locked
parameters.name: lock

post.description: Creates a new draft from an existing asset. If a draft already exists for the specified PID, the existing draft is returned. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: `true` if the new record must also be locked
parameters.name: lock

delete.description: Delete a draft item. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get a single catalogue draft item by its unique identifier. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: `true` if the selected record must be also locked. If a lock already exists and belongs to another user, an error is returned. If no lock is requested, but an existing one is found, it is not released.
parameters.name: lock

put.description: Update an existing draft item. Resources that are not included in the request, are automatically deleted. If `lock` parameter is `true`, the record remains locked. Otherwise, the lock is released once the record is successfully saved. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: `true` if the record must remain locked after a successful save operation. If a lock already exists and belongs to another user, an error is returned.
parameters.name: lock

post.description: Uploads an additional resource file and links it to selected draft instance. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Downloads an additional resource file. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Downloads custom provider contract. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

post.description: Uploads a contract file and links it to selected draft instance. On success, an updated draft is returned. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail.

lock.description: `true` if the record must remain locked after a successful save operation. If a lock already exists and belongs to another user, an error is returned.

post.description: Uploads a contract annex and links it to selected draft instance. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Downloads an annex file for a provider custom contract. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Release the record lock if the authenticated user already owns it. If the record is not locked, the request is ignored. If a lock exists and belongs to another user, an error is returned. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

post.description: Update the metadata properties of an existing draft item that has been accepted by the Helpdesk application. The draft status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_REVIEW`. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

Uploads a file and links it to selected draft instance or adds a resource from an existing file in the user's file system. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

Adds an external link to the draft. When the draft is submitted, the target of the link will be downloaded and added as a file resource to the draft. The file name must be unique. If another file resource already exists with the same name, an error will be returned when the draft is submitted. If an external URL resource already exists with the same URL, it will be overwritten. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Gets metadata property value for the specified resource file. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

Implements a pseudo WMS service for the service resources of assets with type `SERVICE`. Only services of type `WMS` and `WMS` are supported. The endpoint ignores all WMS/WFS parameters except for `BBOX` (bounding box). The CRS is always assumed to be `EPSG:4326`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: Draft unique key. The draft must be an asset of type `SERVICE` with `spatialDataServiceType` in [`WMS`, `WFS`]
parameters.name: draftKey

parameters.description: Resource unique key. The resource must be a service resource.
parameters.name: resourceKey

get.description: Creates a sample for a `WMS` or `WFS` service. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: Draft unique key. The draft must be an asset of type `SERVICE` with `spatialDataServiceType` in [`WMS`, `WFS`]
parameters.name: draftKey

parameters.description: Resource unique key. The resource must be a service resource.
parameters.name: resourceKey

put.description: Accept or reject draft by a provider. If the draft is locked by another user,the operation will fail. The draft status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_REVIEW`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Update draft and submit for review and publication. The lock on the record is automatically released. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Browse consumer's favorite assets and providers. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

parameters.description: User action that created an asset favorite record. When set, only asset favorites are returned and `type` parameter is ignored
parameters.name: action

post.description: Adds a new favorite for an asset or provider. If a record already exists, the existing record is returned. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`

delete.description: Deletes a favorite for an asset or provider. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
Deletes a file or directory. A directory must be empty before deletion. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

parameters.description: Relative path in user's remote file system
parameters.name: path

get.description: List (recursively) files and folders for user's directory. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Downloads a file. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

parameters.description: File path in user's remote file system
parameters.name: path

post.description: Uploads a file to the user's remote file system. If the path does not exist, it is created. If the file already exists, the overwrite attribute must be set to true, or an error is returned. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Creates a directory in the user's remote file system by creating all nonexistent parent directories first. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

get.description: Get a single catalogue draft item by its unique identifier. The draft is returned as if it has been published to the catalogue. All automated metadata is displayed (including hidden ones). Required role: `ROLE_HELPDESK`

Downloads an annex file for a provider custom contract. Required role: `ROLE_HELPDESK`

Enumerate all KYC documents for the authenticated provider or consumer. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Creates a draft KYC document with status `CREATED`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get a single KYC document by its unique identifier. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Submit a draft KYC document for validation. The document status must be `CREATED` . Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Adds a new page to a draft KYC document. Pages can be added only to documents with status `CREATED`. The maximum size per page is `7MB`. The supported formats for the documents are `pdf`, `jpeg`, `jpg` and `png`. The minimum size is `1Kb`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Find the messages of the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

Sends a message to Helpdesk from the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Sends a message to the specified provider from the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`
post.summary: Send a message to a provider

get.description: Get all messages of a thread. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

post.description: Reply to a message thread that belongs to the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

put.description: Marks all messages of a thread as read. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Marks a message as read. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

get.description: Get notebook configuration information. The response, contains all available Jupyter images, user groups, user registered groups and available profiles. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConfigurationResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_CONSUMER`

put.description: Marks all notifications as read. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Marks a notification as read. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

get.description: Get user data for the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

post.description: Update the profile of the authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`

get.description: Check if a company number (VAT) already exists. If `vies` parameter is set to `true`, the vat number is also validated using the VIES VAT RPC API. Required role: `ROLE_USER`
Check if a company name already exists. Required role: `ROLE_USER`
Search provider Order records. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_ANALYTICS`

Get Order details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `OrderResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_ANALYTICS`

put.description: Accept or reject an order when consumer vetting is required. The order status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_APPROVAL`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Uploads order custom provider contract with the consumer's information. The order status is updated. The contract cannot be updated after this call. The order status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_CONTRACT_UPLOAD`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Uploads order custom provider contract with the consumer's information. The order status is not updated. The order status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_CONTRACT_UPLOAD`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Confirm that an order that is delivered externally from the platform has been shipped. The order status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_SEND_CONFIRMATION`. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: PayIn item index. The index is 1-based.

post.description: Creates a quotation for the specified pricing model and quotation parameters. If the operation is successful, an instance of `QuotationResponse` is returned with the new quotation; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages

get.description: Gets a feature collection of regions with an identifier that starts with the specified prefix

parameters.description: The max level (inclusive) of the NUTS regions in the result.If not set, all regions are returned
parameters.name: maxLevel

get.description: Gets the feature of the region specified by the given NUTS code
Searches the NUTS regions of the specified level based on their name. Both local (`name`) and latin (`nameLatin`) fields are searched

Implements a pseudo-WFS service for each level of the NUTS regions. All WFS parameters except for the `bbox` are ignored. The CRS is always set to`EPSG:4326`. Optionally, the response may not included the feature geometries

parameters.description: True if geometries must be included in the response
parameters.name: includeGeometry

get.description: Search the registered subscriptions of provider. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Enumerate all UBO declarations for the authenticated provider. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Creates a draft UBO declaration with status `CREATED`. Only a single UBO declaration with status `CREATED`, `INCOMPLETE` or `VALIDATION_ASKED` can exist. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Get a single UBO declaration by its unique identifier. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Submit the draft UBO declaration for validation. The declaration status must be `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE`. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Adds a new UBO to the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE` can be updated. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Removes a UBO from the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE` can be updated. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Updates an existing UBO of the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE`can be updated. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: Find user services based on one or more criteria. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

post.description: Create a user service from a file in user's file system. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Delete a user service. If the record is locked by another user, the operation will fail. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`

get.description: Find one service by its unique identifier. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Gets metadata property value for the specified resource file. Required role: `ROLE_CONSUMER`, `ROLE_PROVIDER`, `ROLE_VENDOR_PROVIDER`
Search vendor accounts. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

parameters.description: True if only active accounts should be returned
parameters.name: active

post.description: Creates a new vendor account. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`
Accepts vendor invitation to join an organization

delete.description: Deletes an existing vendor account. Only accounts with activation status `UNDEFINED` can be deleted. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Updates an existing vendor account. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

post.description: Invites a user to activate her vendor account. An email is sent with a new activation token. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

delete.description: Disable vendor account. If the account activation status is either `PENDING` or `PROCESSING`, the action is ignored. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

put.description: Enable vendor account. A vendor can enable only accounts with activation status `COMPLETED`. If the account activation status is `UNDEFINED` an error is returned. If the status is either `PENDING` or `PROCESSING`, the action is ignored. Required role: `ROLE_PROVIDER`

get.description: List (recursively) files and folders for user's directory
Downloads a file from user's file system

parameters.description: File path in user's remote file system
parameters.name: path

get.description: Get user data for the authenticated user
Default redirect endpoint for successful forms login operations, used for refreshing the CSRF token. Required role: `ROLE_USER`, `ROLE_HELPDESK`, `ROLE_VENDOR_USER`
Default redirect endpoint for successful logout operations, used for refreshing the CSRF token

sampleAreas.description: Areas of interest (bounding boxes) for creating samples for WMS or WFS service resources. If the property is set to `null`, no sampling operation is executed. This property is applicable only to assets of type `SERVICE` with property `spatialDataServiceType` in [`WMS`, `WFS`]. The sampling is performed after the provider accepts a draft and replaces any data already computed by the profiler service or set by the `samples` property.

population.description: System-defined parameter of the size of selected population. If the pricing model does not support population size parameter, this property is not set

populationPercent.description: System-defined parameter of the selected percent of total population. If the pricing model does not support population size parameter, this property is not set

rows.description: System-defined parameter of the number of rows selected. If the pricing model does not support number of rows parameter, this property is not set

taxPercent.description: Tax applied based on the billing region

max.description: Max date in YYYY-MM-DD ISO format

min.description: Min date in YYYY-MM-DD ISO format
